name: wordpress plugin random post slider
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
This plugin create a post slider on the wordpress website. We have option to customize the slider direction.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/05/28/wordpress-plugin-random-post-slider/

  • Live Demo
  • More Information
  • User Comments
  • About Author

Random post slider wordpress plugin create a post slider on the wordpress website. We have option to customize the slider direction from Scroll Right, Scroll Left, Scroll Up, Scroll Down. This slider use jquery cycle script for the slider effect. the live demo available on my home page.

Features of this plugin

  • Easy to customize.
  • Support all browser.
  • Short code available for pages.
  • Hyperlink option to each post.
  • Separate css file to change the style.

We have three option to install and configure this Image horizontal reel scroll slideshow plugin.

http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/05/28/wordpress-plugin-random-post-slider/
sections.installation:
Method 1

File upload using ftp

Method 2

Direct upload from website admin

Method 3

Upload from website admin with ZIP file

Configuration

We have 2 option to configure this plugin click here to see more info.
sections.faq:
Q1. Can i change the slider direction?

Q2. Can i hide the image from the slider?

Q3. Can i hide the other content tags, authors, category, comment?

Q4. Can i reduce/increase the description character count?

Q5. Can i display the post based on category?

Q6. Can i display random post in the slider?

More info : click to go
sections.changelog:
1.0

First version.

2.0

Category filter option issue fixed.

3.0

Tested up to 3.2.1
Javascript added using enqueue script.

4.0

Tested up to 3.3

5.0

wp_reset_query(); has been added.

6.0

Tested up to 3.4

7.0

New demo link, http://www.gopiplus.com

8.0

Tested up to WordPress 3.5
Avoid registering the alternate jQuery.
From this version we are using existing wordpress jQuery.

9.0

Tested up to WordPress 3.6
Added some security feature.

9.1

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (random-post-slider.po) available in the languages folder.
